Text: Thank you from HotwireKimberly Id like to extend a special thanks to you for being one of Hotwires first air travel customers I hope you enjoyed your travelbuying experience at Hotwire and I look forward to building a lasting relationship The best is yet to come at Hotwire Weve dedicated ourselves to making our service even better Technical and customer service enhancements are currently underway to ensure our site is reliable and easy to use Additionally we will be extending Hotwires travel savings to international flights hotels and rental cars in the near future Our mission is to make it easy for you to save money on travel by providing great deals on the best brands Please feel free to drop me a line at to tell me how Hotwire can better achieve this goal Once again thank you for your support I hope that youll return to Hotwire to let us save you more money on future travels Happy travels Karl Peterson CEO and Cofounder Hotwire PS Since youre one of Hotwires first customers we especially value your opinions and feedback Id like to invite you to join the Hotwire Advisory Panel Well occasionally ask panel members for their opinions about Hotwire whats working whats not working ideas for changes and your thoughts about upgrades were considering If youre interested in participating email
